official_title: To establish the Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Faster FOIA Act of 2007 - Establishes a 16-member Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays to conduct a study concerning methods to reduce delays in processing Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) requests submitted to federal agencies.

titles.title: To establish the Commission on Freedom of Information Act Processing Delays.
